perks.name: Critical Hit +
perks.description: You get more critical hits

perks.name: Breathless
perks.description: You can no longer drown, and can move in liquids with ease.

perks.name: Greed
perks.description: You gain double the gold per nugget.

perks.name: Trick Greed
perks.description: 4x instead of 2x gold is dropped when death is an accident.

perks.name: Gold Is Forever
perks.description: Gold nuggets never disappear.

perks.name: Trick Blood Money
perks.description: Blood money is dropped when death is an accident.

perks.name: Exploding Gold
perks.description: Gold dropped by enemies explodes when it disappears, is picked up or touched by other enemies!

perks.name: Strong Levitation
perks.description: You can fly 100% longer.

perks.name: Faster Levitation
perks.description: You levitate 75% faster.

perks.name: Faster Movement
perks.description: Your movement speed is increased.

perks.name: Never Skip Leg Day
perks.description: Your kicks deal extra damage and knockback.

perks.name: Telekinetic Kick
perks.description: You gain new telekinetic powers.

perks.name: Repelling Cape
perks.description: Stains drop at a fast rate (when moving).

perks.name: Exploding Corpses
perks.description: Enemies explode upon death, but you gain immunity to explosive damage.

perks.name: Saving Grace
perks.description: If you would die and have more than 1 HP, your HP is set to 1 instead.

perks.name: Invisibility
perks.description: You're invisible. Stains, casting spells, kicking and taking damage makes you temporarily visible.

perks.name: More Blood
perks.description: Blood blood blood.

perks.name: All-Seeing Eye
perks.description: You can see everywhere.

perks.name: Levitation Trail
perks.description: When levitating, you leave a trail of magical sparks that harm passing creatures.

perks.name: Vampirism
perks.description: You lose 25% maximum health, but can replenish health by drinking blood.\nBlood doesn't affect satiation level and you no longer suffer from food poisoning.

perks.name: Extra Health (One-off)
perks.description: You gain 50% extra maximum health.

perks.name: Stronger Hearts
perks.description: Hearts bestow more maximum health.

perks.name: Glass Cannon
perks.description: Your spells are 5 times as powerful, but your maximum health becomes 50 and cannot be increased by normal hearts.

perks.name: Living on the Edge
perks.description: Your spells deal 3x damage when you're under 25 HP or 25% of maximum health.

perks.name: Extra Life (One-off)
perks.description: Upon death you respawn with 100 health.

perks.name: Worm Attractor
perks.description: Worms find you attractive.

perks.name: Enemy Radar
perks.description: You can sense nearby enemies.

perks.name: Eat Your Vegetables
perks.description: You inflict more damage the more satiated you are, but you start losing health if your stomach is empty.

perks.name: Iron Stomach
perks.description: You no longer suffer from negative effects of eating.

perks.name: Wand Radar
perks.description: You can sense nearby wands.

perks.name: Item Radar
perks.description: You can sense nearby items.

perks.name: Moon Radar
perks.description: You can sense lunar energy.

perks.name: Spatial Awareness
perks.description: If you stop for a moment, you can sense your location relative to the Mountain.

perks.name: Fire Immunity
perks.description: You take no damage from fire.

perks.name: Toxic Immunity
perks.description: You take no damage from toxic sludge and other toxic things.

perks.name: Explosion Immunity
perks.description: You take no direct damage from explosions.

perks.name: Melee Immunity
perks.description: You take no damage from close-range enemy attacks.

perks.name: Electricity Immunity
perks.description: You take no damage from electric shocks.

perks.name: Teleportitis
perks.description: You take 20% less damage. You teleport away every time you're hurt.

perks.name: Teleportitis Dodge
perks.description: You teleport a short distance away when an enemy projectile is near.

perks.name: Stainless Armour
perks.description: You take 50% less damage as long as you have no active stain status effect.

perks.name: Tinker With Wands Everywhere
perks.description: A divine blessing allows you to tinker with wands everywhere.

perks.name: No Wand Tinkering
perks.description: Wands cannot be tinkered with, but enemies may drop blood money.

perks.name: Wand Experimenter
perks.description: Firing newly found and unmodified wands heals you.

perks.name: Healthy Exploration
perks.description: Every time you visit a new area, you regain 60 health.

perks.name: Bombs Materialized
perks.description: Bomb-like spells can be placed in the ITEMS space in inventory and used like throwable items.

perks.name: Homing Shots
perks.description: Your spells home towards enemies very slightly.

perks.name: Boomerang Spells
perks.description: Your spells arc towards you, but gain extra speed and deal extra damage.

perks.name: Unlimited Spells
perks.description: Most spells are now unlimited.

perks.name: Freeze Field
perks.description: Liquids freeze in your presence.

perks.name: Gas fire
perks.description: Gases near you ignite automatically.

perks.name: Dissolve Powders
perks.description: Sand and other soft, powdery materials dissolve quickly in your presence.

perks.name: Slime Blood
perks.description: You bleed slime, but slime no longer slows you down and you have higher projectile resistance.

perks.name: Oil Blood
perks.description: You bleed flammable oil, but are immune to fire.

perks.name: Gas Blood
perks.description: You bleed flammable gas instead of blood.

perks.name: Permanent Shield
perks.description: You gain a small, permanent shield.

perks.name: Revenge Explosion
perks.description: You release a magical explosion upon taking damage, and gain 25% resistance against explosions.

perks.name: Revenge Tentacle
perks.description: You summon a monstrous tentacle upon taking damage, and gain 25% resistance against projectiles.

perks.name: Revenge Rats
perks.description: When you take damage, there's a chance that a helpful rat minion is summoned

perks.name: Revenge bullets
perks.description: You return fire when hit by projectiles, and you gain 20% resistance against explosions and projectiles.

perks.name: Lukki Mutation
perks.description: You grow curious additional limbs that fight for you.

perks.name: Leggy Mutation
perks.description: You grow disturbing looking limbs that fight for you.

perks.name: Plague Rats
perks.description: Dying enemies release rats to serve your bidding! All rats become your friend.

perks.name: Spontaneous Generation
perks.description: Vomit near you evolves into helpful rat minions

perks.name: Cordyceps
perks.description: Fungal creatures spawn from the corpses of enemies killed by you.

perks.name: Fungal Colony
perks.description: Slime near you spontaneously turns into fungal creatures.

perks.name: Feared by Worms
perks.description: Worms run away from you, and worm and lukki enemies no longer destroy terrain while burrowing.

perks.name: Projectile Repulsion Field
perks.description: Most projectiles are repulsed by your presence, but you take slightly more projectile damage.

perks.name: Close Call
perks.description: You gain additional chance to deal critical hits as long as there are enemies near you.

perks.name: Fungal Disease
perks.description: When near danger, you sprout fungal growths.

perks.name: Projectile Slower
perks.description: Projectiles near you slow down.

perks.name: Projectile Repulsion Sector
perks.description: Projectiles that fly into a small sector in front of you get blown away.

perks.name: Projectile Eater
perks.description: Projectiles that fly into a small sector behind of you disappear.

perks.name: Phasing
perks.description: Projectiles seemingly phase through you.

perks.name: Angry ghost
perks.description: An angry spirit comes to your aid, copying nearby spells and projectiles.

perks.name: Hungry Ghost
perks.description: Summons a happy minion who'll eat enemy projectile every now and then.

perks.name: Mournful Spirit
perks.description: Dying creatures leave behind a spirit that deals damage in a small area.

perks.name: Homunculus
perks.description: Every time you leave a Holy Mountain, a helpful homunculus is summoned.

perks.name: Lukki Minion
perks.description: Summons a lukki minion to your help.

perks.name: Electricity
perks.description: You're immune to electric damage, but metal and liquids around you electrify constantly. Look out!

perks.name: Attract Gold
perks.description: Gold nuggets gravitate towards you.

perks.name: Extra Knockback on Spells
perks.description: Your spells knock enemies around with more force.

perks.name: Concentrated Spells
perks.description: Your spells have lower spread and extra damage, but have increased cast delay.

perks.name: Low Recoil
perks.description: Recoil caused by your spells is greatly reduced, but your spells fly slightly slower.

perks.name: Bouncing Spells
perks.description: Almost all your spells bounce around and last longer.

perks.name: Faster Projectiles
perks.description: Your projectile spells fly faster than before.

perks.name: Always Cast (One-off)
perks.description: A random Always Cast spell is added to the wand in your hand, up to a maximum of 4.

perks.name: High Mana, Low Capacity (One-off)
perks.description: Your currently held wand loses half its capacity, but gains more mana.

perks.name: No More Shuffle
perks.description: Most of the wands will be non shuffling. The wands you carry with you turn into non-shufflers too.

perks.name: No More Knockback
perks.description: Enemies can no longer knock you back.

perks.name: Projectile duplication
perks.description: Your projectile spells have a chance to duplicate, but you're more vulnerable to projectile damage

perks.name: Faster Wands (One-off)
perks.description: All wands you're currently carrying gain a bonus to their cast delay & reload time.

perks.name: Extra Wand Capacity (One-off)
perks.description: The wands you're currently carrying gain 1-3 additional spell slots (to a maximum of 25).

perks.name: Contact Damage
perks.description: Enemies near you take damage, the damage is higher the lower your health gets.

perks.name: Extra Perk
perks.description: From now on you will find an extra perk in every Holy Mountain.

perks.name: Perk Lottery
perks.description: When you pick a perk, there's a 50% chance the others won't disappear.

perks.name: Gamble (One-off)
perks.description: You gain two random perks.

perks.name: Extra Item In Holy Mountain
perks.description: There will be an additional item in every Holy Mountain you haven't discovered yet.

perks.name: More Hatred
perks.description: Creatures become more aggressive towards each other.

perks.name: More Love
perks.description: Creatures become more friendly towards each other.

perks.name: Peace with Gods
perks.description: You make peace with your Gods.

perks.name: Kills to mana
perks.description: Every time an enemy near you dies, you release mana-recharging liquid.

perks.name: Rage-fueled Levitation
perks.description: Killing an enemy makes you replenish some of your levitation power.

perks.name: Pinpointer
perks.description: Your spells fly faster and have lower spread, and you have a handy sightline for aiming!

perks.name: Personal Plasma Beam
perks.description: You constantly fire a devastating plasma beam, but you fire spells much slower

perks.name: Summon Sädekivi (One-off)
perks.description: You gain an artefact that allows you to call the celestial rage.

spells.name: Bomb
spells.description: Summons a bomb that destroys ground very efficiently

spells.name: Spark bolt
spells.description: A weak but enchanting sparkling projectile

spells.name: Spark bolt with trigger
spells.description: A spark bolt that casts another spell upon collision

spells.name: Spark bolt with double trigger
spells.description: A spark bolt that casts two new spells upon collision

spells.name: Spark bolt with timer
spells.description: A spark bolt that casts another spell after a timer runs out

spells.name: Magic arrow
spells.description: A handy magical arrow

spells.name: Magic arrow with trigger
spells.description: A magical arrow that casts another spell upon collision

spells.name: Magic arrow with timer
spells.description: A magical arrow that casts another spell after a timer runs out

spells.name: Magic bolt
spells.description: A powerful magical bolt

spells.name: Magic bolt with trigger
spells.description: A powerful magical bolt that casts another spell upon collision

spells.name: Magic bolt with timer
spells.description: A powerful magical bolt that casts another spell after a timer runs out

spells.name: Burst of air
spells.description: A brittle burst of air capable of greatly pushing objects

spells.name: Energy orb
spells.description: A slow but powerful orb of energy

spells.name: Energy orb with a trigger
spells.description: A slow but powerful orb of energy that casts another spell upon collision

spells.name: Energy orb with a timer
spells.description: A slow but powerful orb of energy that casts another spell after a timer runs out

spells.name: Hookbolt
spells.description: A glowing hook that pulls the caster towards itself upon collision

spells.name: Black hole
spells.description: A slow orb of void that eats through all obstacles

spells.name: Black Hole with Death Trigger
spells.description: A slow orb of void that eats through all obstacles and casts another spell as it expires

spells.name: White hole
spells.description: An orb of positive energy that destroys everything in its path

spells.name: Giga black hole
spells.description: A growing orb of negative energy that destroys everything in its reach

spells.name: Giga white hole
spells.description: A growing orb of positive energy that destroys everything in its reach

spells.name: Omega Black Hole
spells.description: Even light dies eventually...

spells.name: Omega white hole
spells.description: A massive orb of positive energy that destroys everything in its reach

spells.name: Eldritch portal
spells.description: Summons a one-way portal to a sinister realm

spells.name: Spitter bolt
spells.description: A short-lived magical bolt

spells.name: Spitter bolt with timer
spells.description: A short-lived magical bolt that casts another spell after a timer runs out

spells.name: Large spitter bolt
spells.description: A more powerful version of Spitter Bolt

spells.name: Large spitter bolt with timer
spells.description: A more powerful version of Spitter Bolt that casts another spell after a timer runs out

spells.name: Giant spitter bolt
spells.description: The most powerful version of Spitter Bolt

spells.name: Giant spitter bolt with timer
spells.description: The most powerful version of Spitter Bolt that casts another spell after a timer runs out

spells.name: Bubble spark
spells.description: A bouncy, inaccurate spell

spells.name: Bubble spark with trigger
spells.description: A bouncy, inaccurate spell that casts another spell upon collision

spells.name: Disc projectile
spells.description: Summons a sharp disc projectile

spells.name: Giga disc projectile
spells.description: Summons a large, serrated disc with a curious flight pattern

spells.name: Summon Omega Sawblade
spells.description: That's a lot of sawblade

spells.name: Energy sphere
spells.description: A fast, arcing projectile

spells.name: Energy sphere with timer
spells.description: A fast, arcing projectile that casts another spell after a timer runs out

spells.name: Bouncing burst
spells.description: A very bouncy projectile

spells.name: Arrow
spells.description: Summons an arrow

spells.name: Pollen
spells.description: A small, floating projectile that homes towards nearby creatures

spells.name: Glowing lance
spells.description: A magical lance that cuts through soft materials

spells.name: Holy Lance
spells.description: A fast-flying, penetrating lance that glows with power

spells.name: Magic missile
spells.description: A fiery, explosive projectile

spells.name: Large magic missile
spells.description: A more powerful version of Magic missile

spells.name: Giant magic missile
spells.description: The most powerful version of Magic missile

spells.name: Firebolt
spells.description: A bouncy, explosive bolt

spells.name: Firebolt with trigger
spells.description: A bouncy, explosive bolt that that casts another spell upon collision

spells.name: Large firebolt
spells.description: A more powerful version of Firebolt

spells.name: Giant firebolt
spells.description: The most powerful version of Firebolt

spells.name: Odd Firebolt
spells.description: A somewhat peculiar bouncy, explosive bolt

spells.name: Dropper bolt
spells.description: A very heavy explosive bolt

spells.name: Unstable crystal
spells.description: A crystal that explodes when someone comes nearby

spells.name: Unstable crystal with trigger
spells.description: A crystal that explodes and casts another spell when someone comes nearby

spells.name: Dormant crystal
spells.description: A crystal that explodes when caught in an explosion

spells.name: Dormant crystal with trigger
spells.description: A crystal that explodes and casts another spell when caught in an explosion

spells.name: Summon fish
spells.description: FISH!

spells.name: Summon deercoy
spells.description: Summons a seemingly-innocuous deer

spells.name: Flock of Ducks
spells.description: Summons a chaotic flock of spicy ducks

spells.name: Worm Launcher
spells.description: Summons a giant worm to cause havoc for a moment!

spells.name: Explosive Detonator
spells.description: All nearby explosive spells cast by you instantly detonate

spells.name: Concentrated light
spells.description: A pinpointed beam of light

spells.name: Intense concentrated light
spells.description: A spectral wand is summoned that casts a huge beam of light

spells.name: Lightning bolt
spells.description: The primordial force of nature

spells.name: Ball Lightning
spells.description: Summons three short range electrical orbs

spells.name: Plasma beam
spells.description: An instantaneous, dangerous beam of light

spells.name: Plasma Beam Cross
spells.description: Four deadly plasma beams in a cross-shape. Look out, they can hurt you as well!

spells.name: Plasma Cutter
spells.description: A plasma beam specialized in cutting materials!

spells.name: Digging bolt
spells.description: A bolt that is ideal for mining operations

spells.name: Digging blast
spells.description: More powerful digging

spells.name: Chainsaw
spells.description: A good tool for cutting meat. Also has some magical properties...

spells.name: Luminous drill
spells.description: A pinpointed, short-ranged beam of concentrated light

spells.name: Luminous drill with timer
spells.description: A pinpointed, short-ranged beam of concentrated light that casts another spell after a timer runs out

spells.name: Summon Tentacle
spells.description: Calls a terrifying appendage from another dimension

spells.name: Summon Tentacle with timer
spells.description: Calls a terrifying appendage from another dimension! Comes with a timer

spells.name: Healing bolt
spells.description: A magical bolt with rejuvenative powers

spells.name: Deadly heal
spells.description: A projectile that at first deals damage, then heals over time

spells.name: Spiral shot
spells.description: A mystical whirlwind of magic sparks

spells.name: Magic guard
spells.description: Four guarding lights rotate around you for a time

spells.name: Big magic guard
spells.description: Eight guarding lights rotate around you for a time

spells.name: Chain bolt
spells.description: Fires a mysterious bolt that jumps from enemy to enemy

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: A powerful exploding spell

spells.name: Meteor
spells.description: A destructive projectile from the skies!

spells.name: Flamethrower
spells.description: A stream of fire!!

spells.name: Iceball
spells.description: A magical ball of frozen fire

spells.name: Slimeball
spells.description: A dripping ball of poisonous slime

spells.name: Path of dark flame
spells.description: A trail of dark, deadly flames

spells.name: Summon missile
spells.description: A missile!!!

spells.name: Summon rock spirit
spells.description: Summons an autonomous rock ally

spells.name: Dynamite
spells.description: Summons a small explosive

spells.name: Glitter bomb
spells.description: Summons a bomb that explodes into volatile fragments

spells.name: Triplicate bolt
spells.description: A formation of three small, fast bolts

spells.name: Freezing gaze
spells.description: A heart-freezingly sinister aura

spells.name: Pinpoint of light
spells.description: An extremely concentrated point of light that explodes after a moment

spells.name: Prickly Spore Pod
spells.description: Summons a spore pod that attaches to a surface and then grows and explodes into spikes

spells.name: Glue Ball
spells.description: A projectile that explodes into a sticky mess

spells.name: Holy Bomb
spells.description: Summons a bomb that... well...

spells.name: Giga Holy Bomb
spells.description: Bigger and therefore holier

spells.name: Propane tank
spells.description: Summons a propane tank. Be careful what you wish for.

spells.name: Bomb cart
spells.description: Summons a self-propeled mine cart loaded with explosives

spells.name: Cursed sphere
spells.description: A projectile that brings bad luck to anyone it hits

spells.name: Expanding Sphere
spells.description: A slow projectile that increases its damage over time

spells.name: Earthquake
spells.description: Calls the anger of the earth

spells.name: Rock
spells.description: Create a mighty rock out of thin air

spells.name: Summon egg
spells.description: Summons an egg that houses a friendly creature

spells.name: Summon hollow egg
spells.description: Summons an otherwise empty egg that casts a spell upon cracking open

spells.name: Summon Explosive Box
spells.description: Summons a box of explosive matter

spells.name: Summon Large Explosive Box
spells.description: Summons a large box of explosive matter

spells.name: Summon fly swarm
spells.description: Summons five flies to aid you in battle

spells.name: Summon Firebug swarm
spells.description: Summons four fire bugs to aid you in battle

spells.name: Summon Wasp swarm
spells.description: Summon six wasps to aid you in battle

spells.name: Summon Friendly fly
spells.description: Summons a friendly fly that attacks your enemies!

spells.name: Acid ball
spells.description: A terrifying acidic projectile

spells.name: Thunder charge
spells.description: A projectile with immense stored electricity

spells.name: Firebomb
spells.description: Slow, fiery bolt

spells.name: Chunk of soil
spells.description: Don't soil yourself

spells.name: Death cross
spells.description: A deadly energy cross that explodes after a short time

spells.name: Giga death cross
spells.description: A giant, deadly energy cross that explodes after a short time

spells.name: Infestation
spells.description: A bunch of magical sparks that fly in every direction

spells.name: Horizontal barrier
spells.description: A thin, horizontal barrier that harms passing creatures, including you

spells.name: Vertical barrier
spells.description: A thin, vertical barrier that harms passing creatures, including you

spells.name: Square barrier
spells.description: A thin, square-shaped barrier that harms passing creatures, including you

spells.name: Summon Wall
spells.description: Summons a shortlived obstacle

spells.name: Summon Platform
spells.description: Summons a shortlived bit of ground

spells.name: Glittering field
spells.description: Small explosions appear randomly over a large area

spells.name: Delayed spellcast
spells.description: A static, magical phenomenon that casts 3 extra spells after a short while

spells.name: Long-distance cast
spells.description: Casts a spell some distance away from the caster

spells.name: Teleporting cast
spells.description: Casts a spell from the closest enemy

spells.name: Warp cast
spells.description: Makes a spell immediately jump a long distance, stopped by walls

spells.name: Inner spell
spells.description: Causes a projectile to be cast from where the caster is standing

spells.name: Toxic mist
spells.description: A cloud of toxic mist

spells.name: Mist of spirits
spells.description: A cloud of potent alcohol

spells.name: Slime mist
spells.description: A cloud of slimy mist

spells.name: Blood mist
spells.description: A cloud of blood mist

spells.name: Circle of fire
spells.description: An expanding circle of burning air

spells.name: Circle of acid
spells.description: An expanding circle of dripping acid

spells.name: Circle of oil
spells.description: An expanding circle of slick oil

spells.name: Circle of water
spells.description: An expanding circle of water

spells.name: Water
spells.description: Transmute drops of water from nothing

spells.name: Oil
spells.description: Transmute drops of oil from nothing

spells.name: Blood
spells.description: Blood blood blood

spells.name: Acid
spells.description: Transmute drops of acid from nothing

spells.name: Cement
spells.description: Transmute drops of wet cement from nothing

spells.name: Teleport bolt
spells.description: A magical bolt that moves you wherever it ends up flying

spells.name: Small Teleport Bolt
spells.description: A shortlived magical bolt that moves you wherever it ends up flying

spells.name: Return
spells.description: After a period of time, you'll be returned to where you cast this spell

spells.name: Swapper
spells.description: It was theorized that the source of qualia would be transferred …But it turns out it was the whole body all along.

spells.name: Homebringer Teleport Bolt
spells.description: Brings the target hit closer to you

spells.name: Nuke
spells.description: Take cover!

spells.name: Giga Nuke
spells.description: What do you expect?

spells.name: Fireworks!
spells.description: A fiery, explosive projectile

spells.name: Summon Taikasauva
spells.description: Summons a possessed wand to aid you

spells.name: Touch of Gold
spells.description: Transmutes everything in a short radius into gold, including walls, creatures... and you

spells.name: Touch of Water
spells.description: Transmutes everything in a short radius into water, including walls, creatures... and you

spells.name: Touch of Oil
spells.description: Transmutes everything in a short radius into oil, including walls, creatures... and you

spells.name: Touch of Spirits
spells.description: Transmutes everything in a short radius into alcohol, including walls, creatures... and you

spells.name: Touch of Gold?
spells.description: Transmutes everything in a short radius into urine, including walls, creatures... and you

spells.name: Touch of Grass
spells.description: Transmutes everything in a short radius into Earth, including walls, creatures... and you. Unless…

spells.name: Touch of Blood
spells.description: Transmutes everything in a short radius into blood, including walls, creatures... and you

spells.name: Touch of Smoke
spells.description: Transmutes everything in a short radius into smoke, including walls, creatures... and you

spells.name: Destruction
spells.description: Instantly decimates foes around you, at the cost of your HP

spells.name: Muodonmuutos
spells.description: Baa

spells.name: Double spell
spells.description: Simultaneously casts 2 spells

spells.name: Triple spell
spells.description: Simultaneously casts 3 spells

spells.name: Quadruple spell
spells.description: Simultaneously casts 4 spells

spells.name: Octuple spell
spells.description: Simultaneously cast 8 spells

spells.name: Myriad Spell
spells.description: Simultaneously casts as many spells as you have left uncast in your wand

spells.name: Double scatter spell
spells.description: Simultaneously casts 2 spells with low accuracy

spells.name: Triple scatter spell
spells.description: Simultaneously casts 3 spells with low accuracy

spells.name: Quadruple scatter spell
spells.description: Simultaneously casts 4 spells with low accuracy

spells.name: Formation - behind your back
spells.description: Casts two spells: one ahead of and one behind the caster

spells.name: Formation - bifurcated
spells.description: Casts 2 spells in a bifurcated pattern

spells.name: Formation - above and below
spells.description: Casts 3 spells - ahead, above and below the caster

spells.name: Formation - trifurcated
spells.description: Casts 3 spells in a trifurcated pattern

spells.name: Formation - hexagon
spells.description: Casts 6 spells in a hexagonal pattern

spells.name: Formation - pentagon
spells.description: Casts 5 spells in a pentagonal pattern

spells.name: Iplicate Spell
spells.description: Casts a copy of a projectile behind you, but the copy still cost mana

spells.name: Yplicate Spell
spells.description: Casts a copy of a projectile in a bifurcated pattern, but the copy still cost mana

spells.name: Tiplicate Spell
spells.description: Casts copies of a projectile above and below you, but the copies still cost mana

spells.name: Wuplicate Spell
spells.description: Casts copies of a projectile in a trifurcated pattern, but the copies still cost mana

spells.name: Quplicate Spell
spells.description: Casts copies of a projectile in a tetragonal pattern, but the copies still cost mana

spells.name: Peplicate Spell
spells.description: Casts 5 copies of a projectile in a pentagonal pattern, but the copies still cost mana

spells.name: Heplicate Spell
spells.description: Casts 6 copies of a projectile in a hexagonal pattern, but the copies still cost mana

spells.name: Reduce spread
spells.description: Reduces the spread of a spell

spells.name: Heavy spread
spells.description: Gives a projectile a much lower cast delay, but no respect to your aim

spells.name: Reduce recharge time
spells.description: Reduces the time between spellcasts

spells.name: Increase lifetime
spells.description: Increases the lifetime of a spell

spells.name: Reduce lifetime
spells.description: Reduces the lifetime of a spell

spells.name: Nolla
spells.description: The duration of a projectile is set to zero

spells.name: Slow But Steady
spells.description: The reload time of the wand is set to exactly 1.5 seconds

spells.name: Remove Explosion
spells.description: Makes a projectile no longer explode

spells.name: Concentrated Explosion
spells.description: Limits the radius of a projectile's explosion heavily

spells.name: Plasma Beam Enhancer
spells.description: Makes plasma beam spell's beam wider

spells.name: Add mana
spells.description: Adds 30 mana to the wand

spells.name: Blood magic
spells.description: Reduces a spell's mana cost and recharge time greatly, at the costs of four health points

spells.name: Gold to Power
spells.description: Spends 5% of your current gold and adds damage to a projectile proportional to the amount spent

spells.name: Blood to Power
spells.description: A projectile gains additional damage at the cost of 20% of your health

spells.name: Spell duplication
spells.description: Duplicates every spell cast before it

spells.name: Quantum Split
spells.description: Makes a projectile split into three projectiles whose existences are entangled

spells.name: Gravity
spells.description: Increases the effect gravity has on a projectile

spells.name: Anti-gravity
spells.description: Applies a lifting force to a projectile

spells.name: Slithering path
spells.description: Makes a projectile move rapidly in a slithering manner, like a snake

spells.name: Chaotic path
spells.description: Causes a projectile to chaotically fly wherever it wishes

spells.name: Ping-pong path
spells.description: Makes a projectile fly back and forth

spells.name: Avoiding arc
spells.description: Makes a projectile shy away from obstacles

spells.name: Floating arc
spells.description: Makes a projectile float above the ground

spells.name: Fly downwards
spells.description: Causes a projectile to aim straight downwards a short time after casting

spells.name: Fly upwards
spells.description: Causes a projectile to aim straight upwards a short time after casting

spells.name: Horizontal path
spells.description: Forces a projectile on a horizontal path, but increases its damage

spells.name: Linear arc
spells.description: Makes a projectile fly only in cardinal or diagonal lines

spells.name: Orbiting Arc
spells.description: A projectile orbits the point of its origin

spells.name: Spiral Arc
spells.description: A projectile flies in a spiralling pattern

spells.name: Phasing Arc
spells.description: Makes a projectile fly much slower, but teleport short distances over its flight

spells.name: True Orbit
spells.description: Makes a projectile rotate around the caster like an orbiting planet

spells.name: Bounce
spells.description: Makes a projectile bounce on impact

spells.name: Remove Bounce
spells.description: A normally bouncy projectile stops doing so

spells.name: Homing
spells.description: Makes a projectile accelerate towards your foes

spells.name: Anti Homing
spells.description: Makes a projectile accelerate away from your foes

spells.name: Wand Homing
spells.description: Makes a projectile accelerate towards wands

spells.name: Short-range Homing
spells.description: A projectile flies towards targets when near them

spells.name: Rotate towards foes
spells.description: Makes a projectile turn towards your foes

spells.name: Boomerang
spells.description: Gives a projectile a path that curves towards you

spells.name: Auto-Aim
spells.description: Makes a projectile turns towards the nearest visible enemy

spells.name: Accelerative Homing
spells.description: A projectile homes towards enemies at an increasing pace

spells.name: Aiming Arc
spells.description: A projectile rotates towards the direction you're aiming

spells.name: Projectile Area Teleport
spells.description: If a valid target appears somewhere in the proximity of a projectile, the projectile will teleport right on top of the target

spells.name: Piercing shot
spells.description: Makes a projectile fly through enemies, but harmful to the caster

spells.name: Drilling shot
spells.description: Gives a projectile the power to go through the ground

spells.name: Damage Plus
spells.description: Increases the damage done by a projectile

spells.name: Random damage
spells.description: Randomly increases or lowers the damage done by projectiles

spells.name: Bloodlust
spells.description: A projectile gains a hefty damage boost, but is also able to hurt you

spells.name: Mana To Damage
spells.description: If the wand has more than 50 mana, all mana over that is converted into additional damage

spells.name: Critical Plus
spells.description: Gives a projectile +15% chance of a critical hit

spells.name: Damage field
spells.description: Gives a projectile an energy field that constantly deals 3.5 damage to nearby creatures

spells.name: Spells to Power
spells.description: Converts any nearby projectiles cast by you into extra damage

spells.name: Essence to Power
spells.description: Increases a projectile's damage based on the number of creatures nearby

spells.name: Null shot
spells.description: Increases a projectile's duration dramatically but removes all damage & explosion from it

spells.name: Heavy Shot
spells.description: Greatly increases the damage done by a projectile, at the cost of its speed

spells.name: Light shot
spells.description: Makes a projectile move considerably faster, but deal less damage

spells.name: Knockback
spells.description: Gives a projectile the power to knock back the foes it hits

spells.name: Recoil
spells.description: Increases the recoil when casting spells

spells.name: Recoil Damper
spells.description: Reduces the recoil when casting spells

spells.name: Speed Up
spells.description: Increases the speed at which a projectile flies through the air

spells.name: Accelerating shot
spells.description: Causes a projectile to accelerate as it flies

spells.name: Decelerating shot
spells.description: Makes a projectile decelerate as it flies

spells.name: Explosive projectile
spells.description: Makes a projectile more destructive to the environment

spells.name: Clusterbolt
spells.description: Makes a projectile release a cluster of explosive bolts upon hitting a wall

spells.name: Water to poison
spells.description: Makes any water within a projectile's range turns into poison

spells.name: Blood to acid
spells.description: Makes any blood within a projectile's range turns into acid

spells.name: Lava to blood
spells.description: Makes any lava within a projectile's range turn into blood

spells.name: Liquid Detonation
spells.description: Converts nearby nonmagical liquids into explosive gunpowder

spells.name: Toxic sludge to acid
spells.description: Makes any toxic sludge within a projectile's range turn into acid

spells.name: Ground to sand
spells.description: Makes any hard, solid materials within a projectile's range turn into sand

spells.name: Chaotic transmutation
spells.description: Transmutes various liquids and powdery substances within a projectile's range into something else

spells.name: Chaos magic
spells.description: Makes a projectile launch a random spell (out of a limited selection) when it hits something

spells.name: Necromancy
spells.description: Makes corpses of creatures killed by a projectile rise to your aid

spells.name: Light
spells.description: Makes a projectile illuminate its surroundings

spells.name: Explosion
spells.description: A powerful explosion

spells.name: Magical Explosion
spells.description: A large explosion that doesn't damage the ground

spells.name: Explosion of brimstone
spells.description: A fiery explosion

spells.name: Explosion of poison
spells.description: An alchemical explosion

spells.name: Explosion of spirits
spells.description: An inebriating explosion

spells.name: Explosion of thunder
spells.description: An electric explosion

spells.name: Circle of fervour
spells.description: A field of berserk magic

spells.name: Circle of transmogrification
spells.description: A field of sheep-like magic

spells.name: Circle of unstable metamorphosis
spells.description: A field of transformative magic

spells.name: Circle of thunder
spells.description: A field of electrifying magic

spells.name: Circle of stillness
spells.description: A field of freezing magic

spells.name: Circle of vigour
spells.description: A field of regenerative magic

spells.name: Circle of displacement
spells.description: A field of teleportative magic

spells.name: Circle of buoyancy
spells.description: A field of levitative magic

spells.name: Circle of shielding
spells.description: A field of protective magic

spells.name: Projectile gravity field

spells.description: Sucks powder-like materials nearby and releases them upon expiring

spells.name: Liquid Vacuum Field
spells.description: Sucks liquid materials nearby and releases them upon expiring

spells.name: Vacuum Field

spells.name: Sea of lava

spells.name: Sea of alcohol

spells.name: Sea of oil
spells.description: Summons a large body of oil below the caster

spells.name: Sea of water
spells.description: Summons a large body of water below the caster

spells.name: Summon Swamp
spells.description: Summons a large swamp below the caster

spells.name: Sea of acid
spells.description: Summons a large body of acid below the caster

spells.name: Sea of flammable gas
spells.description: Summons a large body of flammable gas below the caster

spells.name: Sea of Mimicium
spells.description: Summons a large body of mimicium under the caster

spells.name: Rain cloud
spells.description: Creates a watery weather phenomenon

spells.name: Oil cloud
spells.description: Creates a rain of oil

spells.name: Blood cloud
spells.description: Creates a rain of blood

spells.name: Acid cloud
spells.description: Creates an rain of acid

spells.name: Thundercloud
spells.description: Creates a stormy cloud

spells.name: Electric charge
spells.description: Gives a projectile an electric charge, that it will release on impact

spells.name: Matter eater
spells.description: Makes a projectile eat the environment as it flies

spells.name: Freeze charge
spells.description: Gives a projectile a frozen charge, that it will release on impact

spells.name: Critical on burning
spells.description: Makes a projectile always do a critical hit on burning enemies

spells.name: Critical on wet (water) enemies
spells.description: Makes a projectile always do a critical hit on wet (water) enemies

spells.name: Critical on oiled enemies
spells.description: Makes a projectile always do a critical hit on oiled enemies

spells.name: Critical on bloody enemies
spells.description: Makes a projectile always do a critical hit on bloody enemies

spells.name: Charm on toxic sludge
spells.description: Makes a projectile charm creatures covered in toxic sludge

spells.description: Makes a projectile explode upon collision with creatures covered in slime

spells.description: Makes a projectile explode powerfully upon collision with creatures covered in slime

spells.name: Explosion on drunk enemies
spells.description: Makes a projectile explode upon collision with creatures covered in alcohol

spells.name: Giant explosion on drunk enemies
spells.description: Makes a projectile explode powerfully upon collision with creatures covered in alcohol

spells.name: Petrify
spells.description: Turns a wounded enemy into stone

spells.name: Downwards bolt bundle
spells.description: Makes a projectile separate into a bundle of 5 explosive bolts as soon as it moves downwards

spells.name: Octagonal bolt bundle
spells.description: Makes a projectile launch 8 magical bolts if it moves slowly enough

spells.name: Fizzle
spells.description: Gives a spell a small probability of short-circuiting

spells.name: Explosive bounce
spells.description: Makes a projectile explode as it bounces

spells.name: Bubbly bounce
spells.description: Makes a projectile shoot bubble sparks as it bounces

spells.description: Makes a projectile release a bundle of concentrated light as it bounces

spells.name: Lightning bounce
spells.description: Makes a projectile release powerful lightning as it bounces

spells.name: Vacuum bounce
spells.description: Makes a projectile remove earth as it bounces

spells.description: Makes creatures hit by a projectile grow tentacles in a chaotic manner

spells.name: Personal gravity field
spells.description: Makes creatures hit by a projectile gain a temporary gravity well that draws projectiles in

spells.description: Makes a projectile release firecrackers when it disappears

spells.description: Gives a projectile a trail of poison

spells.description: Gives a projectile a trail of oil

spells.description: Gives a projectile a trail of gunpowder

spells.description: Gives a projectile a tail of fire

spells.name: Random spell
spells.description: Casts a spell, any spell, at random!

spells.name: Random projectile spell
spells.description: Casts one random projectile spell

spells.name: Random modifier spell
spells.description: Casts one random modifier spell

spells.name: Random static projectile spell
spells.description: Casts one random static projectile spell

spells.name: Copy random spell
spells.description: Casts a random spell among the spells in your wand

spells.name: Copy random spell thrice
spells.description: Casts a random spell among the spells in your wand three times!

spells.name: Copy three random spells
spells.description: Casts three random spells among the spells in your wand

spells.name: Spells to nukes
spells.description: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a nuke, not a good idea

spells.name: Spells to giga sawblades
spells.description: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a giant sawblade

spells.name: Spells to magic missiles
spells.description: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a magic missile

spells.name: Spells to death crosses
spells.description: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a death cross

spells.name: Spells to black holes
spells.description: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a black hole

spells.name: Spells to acid
spells.description: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a pool of acid

spells.name: The end of everything
spells.description: You're heavily advised not to cast this spell.

spells.name: Summon portal
spells.description: Summons a strange portal

spells.name: Add trigger
spells.description: Makes a projectile cast another spell upon collision

spells.name: Add timer
spells.description: Makes a projectile cast another spell after a short time

spells.name: Add expiration trigger
spells.description: Makes a projectile cast another spell upon expiring

spells.name: Chaos larpa
spells.description: Makes a projectile cast copies of itself in random directions

spells.name: Downwards larpa
spells.description: Makes a projectile cast copies of itself with a downwards trajectory

spells.name: Upwards larpa
spells.description: Makes a projectile cast copies of itself with an upwards trajectory

spells.name: Copy trail
spells.description: Makes a projectile leave a trail of copies of itself

spells.name: Larpa Explosion
spells.description: A projectile will shoot out 8 copies of itself when it expires or hits the ground

spells.name: Alpha
spells.description: Casts a copy of the first spell in your wand

spells.name: Gamma
spells.description: Casts a copy of the last spell in your wand

spells.name: Tau
spells.description: Copies the two following spells in the wand when cast

spells.name: Omega
spells.description: Casts copies of every spell in your wand

spells.name: Mu
spells.description: Every modifier-type spell in the current wand is applied to a projectile

spells.name: Phi
spells.description: Casts a copy of every projectile-type spell in the current wand

spells.name: Sigma
spells.description: Copies every static projectile -type spell in the wand when cast

spells.name: Zeta
spells.description: Copies a random spell in another wand you're holding

spells.name: Divide by 2
spells.description: Casts the next spell twice, but with reduced damage

spells.name: Divide by 3
spells.description: Casts the next spell 3 times, but with reduced damage

spells.name: Divide by 4
spells.description: Casts the next spell 4 times, but with reduced damage

spells.name: Divide by 10
spells.description: Casts the next spell 10 times, but with reduced damage

spells.name: Meteorisade
spells.description: Alea iacta est

spells.name: Matosade
spells.description: Alea iacta est

spells.name: Wand Refresh
spells.description: Reloads the wand immediately

spells.name: Requirement - Enemies
spells.description: The next spell is skipped if there are less than 15 enemies nearby

spells.name: Requirement - Projectile Spells
spells.description: The next spell is skipped if there are less than 20 projectiles nearby

spells.name: Requirement - Low Health
spells.description: The next spell is skipped if you have more than 25% health left

spells.name: Requirement - Every Other
spells.description: The next spell is skipped every other time this spell is cast

spells.name: Requirement - Endpoint
spells.description: Any Requirement spells before this will skip all spells between them and this spell

spells.name: Requirement - Otherwise
spells.description: If a Requirement spell before this succeeds, the next spell is skipped

spells.description: Gives a projectile a orange sparkly trail

spells.description: Gives a projectile a green sparkly trail

spells.description: Gives a projectile a yellow sparkly trail

spells.description: Gives a projectile a purple sparkly trail

spells.name: Blue Glimmer
spells.description: Gives a projectile a blue sparkly trail

spells.name: Rainbow Glimmer
spells.description: Gives a projectile a randomly colored sparkly trail

spells.description: Turns a projectile invisible

spells.name: Rainbow trail
spells.description: Gives a projectile a trail of rainbow
